thread.section_title: Ibis London Euston St Pancras - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: More than u need
thread.title_full: More than u need - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: idant85
title: More than u need
text:
the staff were amazing, the breakfast is a lot more than expected, the room was ok for a couple.
Location Location Location --> 30 seconds walk to a main underground station, from there u can go anywhere in the city.
very recommended.
the prices in the official website were cheaper than booking... so...
